## jwtdown-for-react package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AuthContext](./jwtdown-for-react.authcontext.md) | Context Hook for authentication. Store token and other data. |
|  [AuthProvider](./jwtdown-for-react.authprovider.md) | React context provider that provides AuthContext to application, which should be a child node of this component. |
|  [useAuthContext](./jwtdown-for-react.useauthcontext.md) | Context Hook. |
|  [useToken](./jwtdown-for-react.usetoken.md) | Hook that provides token, register, login, logout, fetchWithCookie, and fetchWithToken |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AuthContextType](./jwtdown-for-react.authcontexttype.md) | Object containing the state of AuthContext. This is returned by useAuthContext and is useful to retrieve the token provided by the backend. |
